General.Name: Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells stators, rotor laminations, and cores for motors, generators, and new energy vehicles primarily in China. The company offers new energy vehicle motors, iron core products, power generators, wind power generators, and high voltage motors. Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Tongzhou, China.
General.Address: No.58 Xingshi Road Sian Town, Nantong City, China, 226352

1.Name: Mr. Ying Ling  Lu
